content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ need a cozy hat you can make with any yarn our crochet beanie hat pattern is just what you need and comes with a guide to use yarn in your stash it s versatile and can be made in 8 sizes from newborn to adult ensuring that both little and big heads stay cozy all season long but wait there s more click the link below to explore our full autumn wheat collection we ve got you covered with our crochet hat pattern and a helpful video tutorial following along has never been easier join our vibrant community of crochet lovers and embark on an exciting crochet-along journey don t miss out on this opportunity to create stunning pieces for the upcoming chilly months what sets this hat apart is that it s crocheted flat making it perfect for beginners get ready to be both comfy and stylish with us today ✨ what size can i make this beanie hat ✨ ✔️ beanie hat - 8 sizes baby to adult this hat is crocheted flat we will be working in row from the side across the best part about this design is that we will be working the decreases of the crown and the ribbing at the same time so if you can make a rectangle you can make this hat once we ve made the rectangle we ll join the edges and use the starting tail to close up the top of the hat easy peasy ✨ extra support & tips ✨ ✔️ video tutorials linked on youtube ✔️ join a community of crocheters ✔️ guide to make the hat with any weight yarn ✨ what you will need to make this cozy beanie✨ yarn wecrochet upcycle worsted 1 - 33% alpaca 34% wool 33% acrylic 219yds/100g colorway shown sage weight 4 worsted yarn quantities 70 105 115 135 160 180 195 205 yds 1 ball for all sizes yarn substitutions listed in pattern notions scissors 2 yarn needle 3 removable stitch marker 4 crochet hook h 5 0mm crochet hook 5 ✨ hey i m briana k ✨ join the autumn-inspired crochet along for a cozy crochet experience we ll be creating beautiful wearables together in the briana k community collection i ve designed this collection to be fun and easy with only 1-2 seams required you ll love the pretty aesthetic and perfect fit of these approachable pieces make them for yourself or as gifts i ve enjoyed creating items to match my nephew this season get ready to learn new crochet techniques and build a wardrobe full of warmth and style join me and let s crochet together for the entire collection visit https //brianakdesigns etsy com/listing/1606279143 6 -
